answers.invalidArgs: Gli argomenti o le parole inviate non sono giuste al tipo di comando che vuoi usare.
answers.exception: il programma ha lanciato un errore mentre eseguiva il comando:

translations.error.contentmanager: The ContentManager failed at loading the content. Please report it to the devs.

toofast.info: Only the Bot Owner can use it. Enabled by default

eval.info: Only the Bot Owner can use it.

inviteme.desc: Sends an Link to Invite the Bot to your Guild
inviteme.info: You need to have the MANAGE SERVER permission on the server you want to put the bot.

translations.link: Click the Link to invite the Bot to your Guild

stop.info: Only the Bot Owner can use it.

translations.startup: Hello! I'm now Online and ready to receive commands!
translations.help:
Hello! I'm $(dynamic.botname).
To get started with the Commands, send: $(dynamic.mention) cmds
To invite me to your Guild, send: $(dynamic.mention) bot inviteme
translations.hello1: Hello! I'm $(dynamic.botname). Someone dropped me here!
translations.hello2:
Someone call %s to set my Default Language!
(Because of the Region, I guessed the language as `%s`, but the Guild Owner can set it anytime by executing `$(dynamic.mention) guild lang <en_US|pt_BR|etc>`)

lydia.info:
Quotes pumped from http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Lydia.
 Specify a number to generate multiple.

guard.info:
Quotes pumped from http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Guard_Dialogue.
 Specify a number to generate multiple.

theorygenerator.info: Based on http://www.generatorland.com/usergenerator.aspx?id=10737 data. Specify a number to generate multiple.

stevonnie.info:
Quotes pumped from http://steven-universe.wikia.com/wiki/Stevonnie/Quotes (Spoilers removed).
 Specify a number to generate multiple.

drama.info: Generated from https://drama.thog.eu/drama API. Specify a number to generate multiple.

get.info:
If executed without arguments, return the sender's permissions.
If a user is specified, the user's permissions is returned instead.

set.info:
Define the permissions of a user specified by the parameter.
It doesn't allow, however, lower-ranks changing higher-ranks permissions.

translations.lang.set: Now I'll speak %s in this Guild!

lang.setNone: Now I'll speak the Guild's Default Language!
lang.set: Now I'll speak in %s to you!
